text: The 2015 Tour des Fjords was the eighth edition of the Tour des Fjords cycle stage race. It was a part of the 2015 UCI Europe Tour as a 2.1 event."Tour des Fjords 2015" , Tour des Fjords – Official Website, 2015. Retrieved 24 May 2015 ==Schedule== "Tour des Fjords 2015 - Stages" , Tour des Fjords – Official Website, 2015. Retrieved 24 May 2015 {| class="wikitable" |- !Stage !Date !Course !Distance !colspan="2"|Type !Winner !Ref |- !style="text-align:left"|1 |align=right|27 May |Bergen to Norheimsund |style="text-align:center;"| |22px |Flat stage | | |- !style="text-align:left"|2 |align=right|28 May |Jondal to Haugesund |style="text-align:center;"| |22px |Hilly stage | | |- !style="text-align:left"|3 |align=right|29 May |Stord to Sauda |style="text- align:center;"| |22px |Flat stage | | |- !style="text-align:left"|4 |align=right|30 May |Stavanger to Sandnes |style="text-align:center;"| |22px |Hilly stage | | |- !style="text-align:left"|5 |align=right|31 May |Hinna Park to Stavanger |style="text-align:center;"| |22px |Flat stage | | |- | colspan="2" style="text-align:center;"| Total | colspan="6" style="text- align:center;"| |} ==Teams== 21 teams were selected to take place in the 2015 Tour des Fjords. Four of these were UCI WorldTeams, six were UCI Professional Continental teams, and eleven were UCI Continental teams."Tour des Fjords 2015 - Startlist" , Tour des Fjords – Official Website, 2015.
